name: Uncontained (itch)
description:
This is a simple platformer game called Uncontained. The first level plays out like a regular platforming level, However the second and the third level have fliped controls therefore making a game out of control. The blue platforms give a jump boost and the yellow ones do not allow movement. 

Made by Lev Kreyvenko, Maxim Okhorzin, Misha Akimov, and Pyotr Akimov. For the GMTK GameJam 2020.
